questions.question: What source did people from the Middle Ages get their ideas from about the meaning of life?

choices.answer: Greek and Roman philosophers
Religious beliefs
Humanist scholars
Their parents

questions.question: Which civilization further developed & preserved the knowledge of Greek & Roman civilizations?

choices.answer: The Ancient Egypt Civilization
The Maya Civilization
The Classical Civilization
The Islamic Civilization

questions.question: Where did our form of government (democracy) get it's name from?

choices.answer: It was named after one of our Prime Ministers
the United States' idea of a democratic party
It was named after a Greek God
the Greek system of participatory government

questions.question: Which of the following did Humanists believe about the Individual?

choices.answer: People can achieve great things through learning
The individual should not do anything but serve God
Individuals are not capable of anything
People should have a closed mind and limited worldview
A talented artist of the Renaissance
a Greek philosopher
A patron
A humanist thinker and scholar of the early Renaissance

questions.question: What was an important characteristic of the painting called "the Ambassadors"?

choices.answer: It was a painting of Jesus and his friend
It celebrated the Renaissance individual
It was painted by Leonardo Da Vinci
It cost a lot of money

questions.question: Where does the word "civic" come from?

choices.answer: The word does not have an origin
The English word "civilization"
The Latin word civis, which means "citizen"
A man named Marcus Tullius Cicero

questions.question: Which subjects were added to educational studies during the Renaissance?

choices.answer: Logic, Arithmetic, Astronomy
Greek and Roman writings, Ethics and Morality,  Aesthetics
Public speaking, Geometry, Music
Grammar, Scripture, Medicine

questions.question: Why were the arts important in an era like the Renaissance, and still today?

choices.answer: Art has little importance
Because art belongs to the wealthy
Because art can decorate a room
The arts tell us about a society's worldview

questions.question: Which characteristics set Renaissance paintings apart from Medieval paintings?

choices.answer: Impeccable detail and 3D aspect of  Renaissance paintings
The way Renaissance paintings glorify God and religion
Renaissance paintings are flat and 2 dimensional
The dull colours in Renaissance paintings

questions.question: Which of the following arts were important during the Renaissance, aside from painting?

choices.answer: Architecture
Sculpture
Literature
All of the above
